issue.title: [C++] Migrate ORCFileReader to Result<T>
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13793](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13793). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`ORCFileReader` currently returns Status together with an out-pointer for most methods returning a useful value. New variants of these methods returning a `Result<T>` should be created, and the legacy variants be marked deprecated.
